mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_code AS reservation_code, r.car_code AS car_code, u.user_name AS user_name, u.user_birth_date AS user_birth_date, u.user_phone_number AS user_phone_number, u.user_email AS user_email, u.driver_license_number AS driver_license_number, rc.car_number AS car_number, ct.car_type_name AS car_type_name, ct.model_year AS model_year, cc_fuel.common_name AS fuel_type, rl.branch_name AS rental_location_name, r.rental_date AS rental_date, r.rental_time AS rental_time, rr.branch_name AS return_location_name, r.return_date AS return_date, r.return_time AS return_time, cc_car_status.common_name AS car_status, cc_insurance.common_name AS insurance_name, cc_payment_category.common_name AS payment_category, cc_payment_type.common_name AS payment_type, r.payment_amount AS payment_amount, cc_reservation_status.common_name AS reservation_status, cc_payment_status.common_name AS payment_status, r.payment_date AS payment_date, r.reservation_date AS reservation_date FROM reservations r JOIN users u ON r.user_code = u.user_code JOIN rental_cars rc ON r.car_code = rc.car_code JOIN car_types ct ON rc.car_type_code = ct.car_type_code JOIN branchs rl ON r.rental_location = rl.branch_code JOIN branchs rr ON r.return_location = rr.branch_code JOIN common_codes cc_car_status ON rc.car_status = cc_car_status.common_code AND cc_car_status.common_kind_code = 'car_status' JOIN common_codes cc_fuel ON ct.fuel_type = cc_fuel.common_code AND cc_fuel.common_kind_code = 'fuel_type' JOIN common_codes cc_insurance ON r.insurance_type = cc_insurance.common_code AND cc_insurance.common_kind_code = 'insurance_type' JOIN common_codes cc_payment_category ON r.payment_category = cc_payment_category.common_code AND cc_payment_category.common_kind_code = 'payment_category' JOIN common_codes cc_payment_type ON r.payment_type = cc_payment_type.common_code AND cc_payment_type.common_kind_code = CASE WHEN r.payment_category = '1' THEN 'payment_type_card' WHEN r.payment_category = '2' THEN 'payment_type_pay' ELSE NULL END JOIN common_codes cc_reservation_status ON r.reservation_status = cc_reservation_status.common_code AND cc_reservation_status.common_kind_code = 'reservation_status' JOIN common_codes cc_payment_status ON r.payment_status = cc_payment_status.common_code AND cc_payment_status.common_kind_code = 'payment_status' WHERE reservation_code = #{reservationCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations WHERE user_code = #{userCode}

SELECT u.user_name AS user_name, u.user_phone_number AS user_phone_number, r.reservation_code AS reservation_code, r.reservation_date AS reservation_date, rl.branch_name AS rental_branch_name, rl.branch_detailed_address AS rental_branch_address, rl.branch_phone_number AS rental_branch_phone_number, r.rental_date AS rental_date, r.rental_time AS rental_time, rt.branch_name AS return_branch_name, rt.branch_detailed_address AS return_branch_address, rt.branch_phone_number AS return_branch_phone_number, r.return_date AS return_date, r.return_time AS return_time, r.payment_date AS payment_date, r.payment_amount AS payment_amount, rc.model_year AS model_year, ct.car_type_name AS car_type_name, cc_seating_capacity.common_name AS seating_capacity, cc_license_restriction.common_name AS license_restriction, cc_speed_limit.common_name AS speed_limit, cc_insurance_type.common_name AS insurance_type, cc_fuel_type.common_name AS fuel_type, cc_payment_status.common_name AS payment_status, cc_payment_category.common_name AS payment_category, cc_payment_type.common_name AS payment_type FROM reservations r JOIN users u ON r.user_code = u.user_code JOIN branchs rl ON r.rental_location = rl.branch_code JOIN branchs rt ON r.return_location = rt.branch_code JOIN rental_cars rc ON r.car_code = rc.car_code JOIN car_types ct ON rc.car_type_code = ct.car_type_code LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_insurance_type ON cc_insurance_type.common_kind_code = 'insurance_type' AND r.insurance_type = cc_insurance_type.common_code LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_fuel_type ON cc_fuel_type.common_kind_code = 'fuel_type' AND ct.fuel_type = cc_fuel_type.common_code LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_seating_capacity ON cc_seating_capacity.common_kind_code = 'seating_capacity' AND ct.seating_capacity = cc_seating_capacity.common_code LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_speed_limit ON cc_speed_limit.common_kind_code = 'speed_limit' AND ct.speed_limit = cc_speed_limit.common_code LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_license_restriction ON cc_license_restriction.common_kind_code = 'license_restriction' AND ct.license_restriction = cc_license_restriction.common_code LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_payment_status ON cc_payment_status.common_kind_code = 'payment_status' AND r.payment_status = cc_payment_status.common_code LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_payment_category ON cc_payment_category.common_kind_code = 'payment_category' AND r.payment_category = cc_payment_category.common_code LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_payment_type ON cc_payment_type.common_kind_code = CASE WHEN r.payment_category = '1' THEN 'payment_type_card' WHEN r.payment_category = '2' THEN 'payment_type_pay' ELSE NULL END AND r.payment_type = cc_payment_type.common_code WHERE r.user_code = #{userCode} AND r.reservation_code = #{reservationCode};
